description: This Kotlin source file defines multiple interfaces related to data repositories used in the application, along with several data classes representing content info, configuration settings, and image assets. It also includes mock implementations for these repositories, providing static or bundled resources for offline or testing purposes.

classes.name: MockContentRepository
classes.description: Mock implementation of ContentRepository providing static content info and section list.

classes.name: MockMetadataRepository
classes.description: Mock implementation of MetadataRepository that retrieves strings from application resources and provides default rating settings.

classes.name: MockAssetsRepository
classes.description: Mock implementation of AssetsRepository that returns asset paths for images.

classes.name: MockRatingRepository
classes.description: Mock implementation of RatingRepository storing liked state in-memory.

classes.name: IndiceCopy
classes.description: Data class encapsulating textual content for various sections and call-to-action elements.

classes.name: InstructionImages
classes.description: Data class holding paths or URLs for instructional images used in UI.

classes.name: ContentInfo
classes.description: Data class providing minimal info about content, including ID, title, and poster image URL.

classes.name: VodRatingSettings
classes.description: Data class for configuration settings related to rating overlay display times and rolling credits.
